DOC.brief_summary: This extension V102_16 study ( NCT02140762 ) . V102_16E1 design assess effectiveness 3-dose vaccination series MenABCWY , administer accord 0 , 2 , 6 month schedule , panel endemic US N. meningitidis serogroup B strain , measure enc-hSBA assay . The subject complete parent V102_16 study invite time last study visit participate extension study .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Effectiveness , Immunogenicity Safety Meningococcal ABCWY Vaccine Administered Healthy Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Adolescents complete V102_16 study receive study vaccine assign protocol ( either two dos MenABCWY one dose MenACWY Placebo ) . Serious , acute , chronic illness . Previous suspected disease cause N. meningitidis . History meningococcal vaccine administration vaccination give parent V102_16 protocol .
